title: Developer
details: Planned and built a new internet bank with React and Apollo GraphQL
Created and maintained multiple micro-services in java (spring-boot) and node (express/nestjs)
Worked with evaluating micro-frontends as an architectural alternative for the different platforms
Co-created and contributed heavily to SBAB-UI, an internal component library, to align frontend styling and save developer time

title: Developer
details: Built and maintained a white labeled app in React Native that allowed customers to open their garage door without leaving their car
Co-developed and designed a parking management software in Ruby on Rails (Park46) complete with integrations to popular payment providers
Developed Laddkoll, an app that lets you find and pay for parking with EV chargers

title: Freelance Developer
details: Collaborated with newly founded agency Sebton/Co on a project for SHHBostad with SOAP integrations to Vitec for listings
Web development and consultancy for various smaller clients

title: Frontend Developer
details: A lot of work for Swish, one of Swedens largest payment providers, ranging from their then official website to animation prototyping in Framer and concept development for commercials
Conceptual work for Elkjøp, the largest consumer electronics retailer in the cordic region, around in-store tracking and AI-driven store layouts
Some very secrative work for a major asian electronics company, mainly focused on interface prototyping for luxury devices.

title: Frontend Developer
details: Developed parts of the PS4 companion app for Wolfenstein: The New Order for Machinegames
Developed a car rental site for Mabi

title: Developer Intern
details: Played around with css animations for WWF which resulted in Wonder World Fur that got us a Site of the day at the FWA's
Created prototypes for pitch material for Mentos and Coca Cola
